description: scrcpy stopped working on Debian 11. Maybe due to a new version of Android. I tried this and it works perfectly plus it's much easier to use than the command line version. Great Job
Was the only way i found to do screen mirroring with my phone.

Can only hope they augment it with a dialer and SMS handler.

Thank you, thank you, thank you.

Guiscrcpy is an everyday app! I simply couldnt live without it, especially having to use two phones. I did have an issue with other guiscrcpy snaps since the update to Fedora 35. I installed this flatpak version. The phone needed to be recognized but once I approved, the window came up and started the emulator. Works perfect with multiple phones. Love the interface, nice dark theme as well! Great developer!
summary: Works great on Fedora 35 for me!
